verses.verse: <S%G1899>Then<s%> <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G1223>after<s%> I <S%G305>went<s%> up <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> and <S%G4838>took<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> with me <S%G2532>also.<s%>

And I <S%G305>went<s%> up by <S%G602>revelation,<s%> and <S%G394>communicated<s%> to them that <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> but <S%G2596>privately<s%> <S%G2398><s%> to them which were of <S%G1380>reputation,<s%> <S%G3381>lest<s%> by <S%G3381>any<s%> <S%G4458>means<s%> I should <S%G5143>run,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> had <S%G5143>run,<s%> in <S%G2756>vain.<s%>
But <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G5103>Titus,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> was with me, <S%G5607>being<s%> a <S%G1672>Greek,<s%> was <S%G315>compelled<s%> to be <S%G4059>circumcised:<s%>

And that <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G5569>false<s%> <S%G5569>brothers<s%> <S%G3920>unawares<s%> <S%G3920>brought<s%> in, <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G3922>came<s%> in <S%G3922>privately<s%> to <S%G2684>spy<s%> out our <S%G1657>liberty<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> that they might <S%G2615>bring<s%> us into <S%G2615>bondage:<s%>

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G1502>gave<s%> <S%G1502>place<s%> by <S%G5292>subjection,<s%> no, not for an <S%G5610>hour;<s%> that the <S%G225>truth<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> might <S%G1265>continue<s%> with you.

But of these who <S%G1380>seemed<s%> to be <S%G5100>somewhat,<s%> <S%G3697>(whatever<s%> <S%G4219><s%> they were, it <S%G1308>makes<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G1308>matter<s%> to me: <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2983>accepts<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G444>man's<s%> <S%G4383>person:<s%>) for they who <S%G1380>seemed<s%> to be somewhat in <S%G4323>conference<s%> <S%G4323>added<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> to me:

But <S%G5121>contrariwise,<s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> that the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> was <S%G4100>committed<s%> to me, as the gospel of the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> was to <S%G4074>Peter;<s%>

(For he that <S%G1754>worked<s%> <S%G1754>effectually<s%> in <S%G4074>Peter<s%> to the <S%G651>apostleship<s%> of the <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> the <S%G2532>same<s%> was <S%G1754>mighty<s%> in me <S%G1519>toward<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles:<s%>)

And when <S%G2385>James,<s%> <S%G2786>Cephas,<s%> and <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1380>seemed<s%> to be <S%G4769>pillars,<s%> <S%G1097>perceived<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that was <S%G1325>given<s%> to me, they <S%G1325>gave<s%> to me and <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hands<s%> of <S%G2842>fellowship;<s%> that we should go to the <S%G1484>heathen,<s%> and they to the <S%G4061>circumcision.<s%>

<S%G3440>Only<s%> they would that we should <S%G3421>remember<s%> the <S%G4434>poor;<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2532>also<s%> was <S%G4704>forward<s%> to <S%G4160>do.<s%>
But <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> I <S%G436>withstood<s%> him to the <S%G4383>face,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he was to be <S%G2607>blamed.<s%>

For <S%G4253>before<s%> that <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> from <S%G2385>James,<s%> he did <S%G4906>eat<s%> with the <S%G1484>Gentiles:<s%> but <S%G3753>when<s%> they were <S%G2064>come,<s%> he <S%G5288>withdrew<s%> and <S%G873>separated<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G5399>fearing<s%> them which were of the <S%G4061>circumcision.<s%>

And the <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4942>dissembled<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> with him; <S%G5620>so<s%> that <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> was <S%G4879>carried<s%> <S%G4879>away<s%> with their <S%G5272>dissimulation.<s%>

But <S%G3753>when<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> that they <S%G3716>walked<s%> not <S%G3716>uprightly<s%> <S%G4314>according<s%> to the <S%G225>truth<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> I <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> them <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> you, <S%G5225>being<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> after the <S%G1483>manner<s%> of <S%G1483>Gentiles,<s%> and not as do the <S%G2452>Jews,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G315>compel<s%> you the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> to <S%G2198>live<s%> as do the <S%G2450>Jews?<s%>
We who are <S%G2453>Jews<s%> by <S%G5449>nature,<s%> and not <S%G268>sinners<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%>

<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> that a <S%G444>man<s%> is not <S%G1344>justified<s%> by the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> but by the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> in <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> that we might be <S%G1344>justified<s%> by the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and not by the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law:<s%> for by the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> shall <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> be <S%G1344>justified.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if,<s%> while we <S%G2212>seek<s%> to be <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> we ourselves <S%G2532>also<s%> are <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G268>sinners,<s%> is <S%G686>therefore<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> the <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G266>sin?<s%> <S%G3361>God<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361>forbid.<s%> <S%G1096><s%>
For <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G3618>build<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2647>destroyed,<s%> I <S%G4921>make<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> a <S%G3848>transgressor.<s%>
For I <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> am <S%G599>dead<s%> to the <S%G3551>law,<s%> that I might <S%G2198>live<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

I am <S%G4957>crucified<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ:<s%> <S%G1161>nevertheless<s%> I <S%G2198>live;<s%> <S%G3765>yet<s%> not I, but <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2198>lives<s%> in me: and the life <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> I <S%G2198>live<s%> by the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> me, and <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> for me.

I do not <S%G114>frustrate<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> for <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> come by the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G599>dead<s%> in <S%G1432>vain.<s%>
